}}'''The Steadfast''' is the twentieth track of the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-themed album [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]] by [[Blind Guardian]]. The song references [[Morgoth]] and the curse of [[Húrin]] and his kin for refusing to reveal the hidden city of [[Gondolin]].<ref>{{S|22}}</ref>

== Lyrics ==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Now truly I am king of the world
Master of fate
Damned shall thy house be
Thou shall not question my power
Nor shall thou defy me further
</poem>
